item.description:
I'm would like to schedule a Meetup for November 18th a 2:00 at the Broad Brook Opera house to see You're a Good Man, Charile Brown

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The tickets are $17 for Seniors (over 60) and $21 for all others. I live close to the theatre. So afterwards we could go to my house & order pizza. Let me know if you're interested. All seats have to be reserved in advance. So I would have to know how many tickets we would need.

http://www.operahouse...

It's considered a family show. So I expect families will come including kids.

Â 

I will have to order the tickets for the group. The tickets are reserved for a specific row.

group.name: The Eastern CT Widows and Widowers Meetup Group

item.name: You're a Good Man, Charlie Brown
